Member Function Documentation

virtual const std::string& Capability::get_name ( )
inlinevirtual
Returns
The name of the capability. For the base class, this name is "capability_base_class".

Reimplemented in MoveForwardCapability, and TwoDMoveCapability.

Definition at line 57 of file capability.h.

virtual bool Capability::is_named ( const std::string &  capability_name)
inlinevirtual

Compares the name of the capability to a given name. Mind that the name of a capability is not an attribute of a particular instance of a Capability, but a class attribute.

Parameters
capability_nameSome string
Returns
true, if capability_name is the name of this capability.
